== Description ==
Retrieve the current post title for the feed.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_the_title_rss() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Current post title.

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* Uses: [[Function_Reference/apply_filters|<tt>apply_filters()</tt>]] Calls '<tt>the_title_rss</tt>' on the post title.
* Uses: [[Function_Reference/get_the_title|get_the_title()]] to get the post title.

== Change Log ==
Since: 2.0.0

== Source File ==

<tt>get_the_title_rss()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/feed.php}}.
